page.title: 14Population
page.content: This area relies heavily on tourism. During the summer the population increases considerably with holiday makers, day trippers and coach tours. This vast influx of visitors does affect the local community as the shops, hotels and guest houses become full, so we find our narrow picturesque streets bulging with strangers. We are quite relieved when winter comes, and Hawkshead is peaceful once more. Much of the population consists of retired people, many of whom have come from urban districts, whereas younger people tend to move away for college or employ- ment, perhaps returning later with a trade or profession to their credit, enabling them to start up a business of their own. Another section of the community are those who have left behind the pressures of city life.
